summary: Missing App Tile on Fiori Launchpad
description: User is assigned the Financial Accountant role but cannot see the 'Upload General Journal Entries' tile on their Launchpad.

summary: How to use Global Search for a GL Account?
description: User is unclear on how to utilize the persistent search bar to find a specific Document Number or GL Account quickly.
The 'Days of Sales Outstanding' dynamic tile is showing cached data from yesterday instead of live metrics.
User needs assistance switching the Fiori Launchpad theme from Belize to High Contrast in their user profile.
UI takes too long to load. Request to disable animations and switch home page display to 'Show one group at a time'.

summary: Setting Default Values for Cost Center
description: Fields in transactional apps are not auto-filling. Need to configure default Controlling Area and Cost Center.

summary: How to add an app using App Finder?
description: User needs to find an analytical app that is not on their home screen and pin it to a custom tile group.
Clicking on the KPI chart to drill down into line items results in an authorization error.

summary: Upload General Journal Entries via Excel
description: User needs the standard Excel template to upload 500 journal entries through the Fiori app.
User is using the SAP GUI transaction /N/UI2/FLP but wants to know the direct web URL for browser access.

summary: Missing Confirmation Email for Trial Setup
description: User signed up for a 30-day trial but has not received the setup link in their main inbox or spam/promotions folder.
User cannot log in because they do not know how to locate their Org ID for account verification.
Sales manager is unable to see the active deals and campaign performance widgets on their Home Dashboard.

summary: How to move deals in Visual Pipeline?
description: User needs instructions on how to drag and drop 'Opportunities' to the next closing stage.
Need to enable activity logging to automatically sync customer emails into the lead timeline.

summary: Einstein GPT not generating subject lines
description: The AI assistant is failing to draft follow-up emails based on recent meeting notes inside the Opportunity.
The AI-adjusted revenue estimates differ significantly from manual sales rep estimates for Q3.
The contact record view is not pulling in recent engagement from the linked corporate LinkedIn account.
The automated SMS campaign is sending messages to contacts who already replied to the previous email step.

summary: How to filter Interactive Reporting by Region?
description: Marketing lead needs to customize the dashboard view to only show ROI metrics for the EMEA team.
